resources.string: Accelerometer, Custom algorithm 2, Uses signal processing, Can estimate type of activity like walking or running
Accelerometer, Custom algorithm 1, Uses simple calculations, less accurate, more false positives
Step Counter, Built-in sensor, high accuracy but more delay, may not exist in some devices
Step Detector, Built-in sensor, Faster but less accurate, may not exist in some devices
-1 indicates the sensor is offline or not available
